name: WC Mideval Video Game
description:
Step one of the process... see if it even works!!

Let me know how long it takes (guestimate), and if the game runs. It is the 0.5 version, so there might be a few glitches in it (text length, null values), but ut should still be playable.

Well, thanks to anyone who tries. Send me a line, or visit the FB page to comment.

Thanks again.
